name: Tang
declaringWar: You won't ever be able to bother me again. Go meet Yama.
attacked: Fool! I will disembowel you all!
defeated: You have proven to be a cunning and competent adversary. I congratulate you on your victory.
introduction: Greetings, I am Empress Wu Zetian. China desires peace and development. You leave us alone, we'll leave you alone.
tradeRequest: My friend, do you think you can accept this request?
uniques: Great General provides double combat bonus

name: Akkad
declaringWar: You hinder the interests of the Ruler of Totality, and thus, you shall be vanquished.
attacked: You will see a unprecendented conquest by me, little man. Our troops are never busy in peace.
defeated: Say all you want about my land, you can smash my epics about me, but I am engraved to the memory of the gods.
introduction: I am Sargon of Akkad, the King of Akkad herself, King of Sumer, and King of the Universe. What would you like to discuss to I?
tradeRequest: Our heartland may be far away from yours, but we offer you this agreement.

name: Sumer
declaringWar: Your actions will guarantee your imminent death, you will be immortal.... as a villain of the epics.
attacked: Dont you see, how I spent all these years searching for immortality? I am about to have it.
defeated: I may die a mortal death, but my deeds will be enscribed throughout the world once your filthy cities rot.
introduction: I am Gilgamesh, King of Uruk, would you like to be friends with me?
tradeRequest: Greetings! We offer you this trade exchange, we understand your reasoning if you may reject this.
uniques: [+2 Culture] from [Flood plains] tiles [in all cities]

name: Elam
declaringWar: A barbarian you are, your plains will be piled up by the bodies of your soldiers
attacked: Such foolish decision. I have destroyed dynasties, and you shall be one of them.
defeated: Woe to you.
introduction: Welcome, foreigner. I am Kindattu of Elam.
tradeRequest: Foreigner, we can exchange goods if you will.

name: Mitanni
declaringWar: We may be different from the rest of our neighbours, but we can still destroy you.
attacked: Do you dare to challenge me?
defeated: Woe to you.
introduction: Welcome, stranger. I am Parshatatar, king of the Hurrians.
tradeRequest: Stranger, we can exchange goods if you will.
uniques: [3] free [Chariot Archer] units appear <upon discovering [Horseback Riding]>

name: Hittites
declaringWar: We will build hills out of your soldier's corpses.
attacked: Do you dare to challenge me, little one?
defeated: You can destroy our cities, pillage our farms, but our light shall prevail to the gods.
introduction: Welcome, stranger. I am Mursili, king of the Hittites.
hateHello: What do you want?, little one?
tradeRequest: Dearest king, we can exchange goods if you will.
uniques: [+2 Gold, +1 Production] from [Iron] tiles [in all cities]

name: Arzawa
declaringWar: You are a danger to us.
attacked: Ha?
defeated: Sooner your cities and farms will be destroyed by the wrath of the gods.
introduction: Welcome to Luwia, I am the king Tarhuntaradu.
tradeRequest: Dearest king, we can exchange goods if you will.
uniques: [+1 Gold, +2 Culture] from [Gold Ore] tiles [in all cities]
[+2 Gold, +3 Culture] from [Copper] tiles [in all cities]

name: Minoa
declaringWar: Your nation shall be crushed.
attacked: A lion is more civilized than what you are, do you want to go to Daedalus?
defeated: I wish you fortune for the ages to come.
introduction: I am Minos of Crete, bow down for you are mortals.
tradeRequest: Greetings mortal, we can have goods to exchange.

name: Assyria
declaringWar: I fear there is no other choice but to remove you from this world!
attacked: I think you will come to regret this decision...most unwise.
defeated: We may be defeated, but our legacy will live on in the written word!
introduction: I welcome you to the great kingdom of Assyria...have you come to view my library?
tradeRequest: Will you consider a trade?

name: Israel
declaringWar: You are a threat to our salvation.
attacked: With Yahweh we shall smite your armies and follow His orders, unless He wills otherwhise.
defeated: Even though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I fear no evil, for He is with me.
introduction: Welcome to the land of the Israelites. I am David the anointed king, the leader of the people Moses had freed from slavery, and a servant of Yahweh.
tradeRequest: Will you consider a trade?

name: Phoenicia
declaringWar: The warships will arive at any time now, be afraid.
attacked: Your foolish boats will sink before your harbor is out of your sight.
defeated: Take care of our ports.
introduction: I am Hiram, king of Sur. Here you see are my grandiose ports.
tradeRequest: Will you consider a trade?
uniques: Enables embarkation for land units <starting from the [Ancient era]>
Enables [All] units to enter ocean tiles <upon discovering [Compass]>

name: Zhou
declaringWar: The good will prevail.
attacked: Honesty is the best policy, and you have honestly displayed your thoughts.
defeated: The general of a large army may be defeated, but you cannot defeat the determined minds of the people.
introduction: Greetings, I am Confucius, the great teacher of all.
hateHello: We are open to your words.
tradeRequest: Dear friend, it is up to your will to accept this request.

name: Magadha
declaringWar: Even if almost every citizen of ours is dead your defeat will be glorious.
attacked: Just like Arjuna your generals shall perish.
defeated: Take care of our lands, our animals, and whatever we have for you.
introduction: I am Bimbisara of the land of the Indians, and a companion of the Buddha.
hateHello: We are open to your words.
tradeRequest: Shall you accept this request by me?
uniques: [+1 Faith] from [Forest] tiles [in all cities] <after discovering [Writing]>

name: Nubia
declaringWar: Arrows will be fired to your soldier's throats, for you are more aggressive than a lion.
attacked: Nice for us that you want defeat.
defeated: Our monuments will last for eternity, for you shall certainly fall.
introduction: I am Amanitore, the Queen of Nubia. Speak more about your people, we can share information about each other.
tradeRequest: Let us exchange goods for our betterment.
uniques: [+1 Food, +1 Production] from [Desert] tiles [in all cities]

name: Urartu
declaringWar: The mountains of Urartu will collapse to your filthy plains.
attacked: How dare you underestimate us.
defeated: The mountains are our monuments, indestructible forever.
introduction: I am Argishti, king of Urartu, I welcome you to our numerous mountains.
tradeRequest: Would you be kind to accept this agreement of ours?
uniques: [+2 Gold, +1 Food] from [Mountain] tiles [in all cities]

name: Lydia
declaringWar: The Oracle says you will be vanquished.
attacked: It's certain that we will defeat you.
defeated: I shouldn't have trusted the Oracle.
introduction: I am Croesus, king of Lydia. The Oracle says we will be good friends
tradeRequest: The Oracle says we will benefit from this agreement.
uniques: Provides a [Market] in your first [3] cities for free <upon discovering [Currency]>

name: Medes
declaringWar: Such a fool you are, you shall be vanquished.
attacked: How dare you.
defeated: This may be your first conquest, but our legacy is engrained today.
introduction: I am Cyaxares, king of the Medians.
tradeRequest: Friend, would you accept this agreement?

name: Scythia
declaringWar: You wage war on your best friends, the punishment must be done.
attacked: You are more treacherous than Cyrus.
defeated: Your filthy soul shall burn in the afterlife.
introduction: I am Tomyris, queen of the Scythians, may we be friends?
tradeRequest: Fellow friend, would you accept this exchange of mine?
uniques: [2] free [Saka Horse Archer] units appear <upon discovering [The Wheel]>

name: Olmecs
declaringWar: You must be removed from this world.
attacked: Go ahead.
defeated: Our monuments will last until the end of time.
introduction: Greetings, stranger. I am Dragon Claw
tradeRequest: Friend, let us exchange goods.
uniques: [+1 Production, +1 Gold] from [Cotton] tiles [in all cities]

name: Etruscans
declaringWar: The gods have chosen me for this endeavour.
attacked: We will make such inflicting blows to your morale and sanity.
defeated: You may destroy our monuments, erase our language from the world, but the gods have favor in us.
introduction: I am Tarchon, king of the Etruscans. To you we may be aliens, but do not worry, we are a friendly people.
tradeRequest: Let us exchange resources for the betterment of our nations.
uniques: Receive free [Great Artist] when you discover [Construction]

name: Indus
declaringWar: You must fall.
attacked: What did you just do?
defeated: Some day they shall find our ruined cities.
introduction: I am the king of the inhabitants of the Indus. Don't hesitate to befriend us.
tradeRequest: Let us exchange resources for the betterment of our nations.
uniques: Provides a [Aqueduct] in your first [4] cities for free <upon discovering [Engineering]>

name: Norte Chico
declaringWar: You must fall.
attacked: What did I do to you?
defeated: Such a fool you are.
introduction: Welcome to the coast of our precious land.
tradeRequest: We request this exchange if you will it.
uniques: [+1 Production] from [Water resource] tiles [in all cities]

name: Lacedaemon
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: What a fine battle! Sparta is willing to serve you!

name: Palembang
declaringWar: I will enjoy hearing your last breath as you witness the destruction of your realm!
attacked: Now, witness the power of the Indonesians!
defeated: What treachery has struck us? No, what evil?
